website_summaries.verdict: The best travel pillow on the market – offers MyPillow's patented features in a compact pillow for on-the-go comfort.
pros: Portable and convenient – a 12-inch by 18-inch travel pillow that rolls to a compact size
Retains its support when removed for use
cons: Some owners found it smaller than expected, while others didn't like the texture of the material of the travel pillow case that comes with it

customer_reviews.title: Buying this “sample “ size will give you the confidence you need to try other My Pillow products
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of all the hype surrounding My Pillow products, not to mention the cost. So I decided to buy this travel size to test it out. The pillow looked well made as did the neat little case for it. Just touching it, I did not see anything extraordinary, but, when using it in combination with my old pillow, I found it to be everything the ads say. I DO sleep better with it and more comfortably, especially in the neck area.
customer_reviews.author: LPC

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing travel pillow that I also used in the hotel ...
customer_reviews.text: Relief!!!!! This is an amazing travel pillow that I also used in the hotel we stayed at in Tel Aviv in November I had cervical spine surgery August 2,3017 C3-7. I was concerned about such an aggressive wonderful trip ahead . I HAD TO BE COMFORTABLE My Pillow travel Pillow was my best friend for the 10,000 mile trip one way and 10,000 miles back home. I took it on car trips around Israel I even used it as my pillow at the hotel Can’t say enough about quality Respectfully, you should buy this amazing quality of life Pillow Having it as your bestie for 20,000 air miles was amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: grannytotwo

customer_reviews.title: Good travel pillow with a suggestion for great
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is good for traveling, and packs easily. I would suggest either a longer pillow case so the pillow will maintain its smallest footprint when rolled up or a velcro fastener on the edge of the pillow itself. The current pillowcase will not hold the pillow rolled up for long. I rolled mine up tight, fastened it with rubber bands and crammed it in a gallon ziplock so it would take up the smallest amount of room in my carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: Nightwitch

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. Bought it for the trips, as I can`t sleep on the hotel pillow, no matter how expensive the hotel is. But, when I started using it, I realized that I like it better than the one I have used for years! Am going to purchase another one. Definitely a great buy. Am surprised to be saying that, as I never thought this pillow would make that much difference! It does! If you had 10 starts I would give them to this baby pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenija Roye

customer_reviews.title: Underfilled
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I've been using the standard MyPillow for years and absolutely love it & can't possibly sleep with anything else. But the travel size sucks! The standard size really does support the neck for a side sleeper like me and has virtually eliminated my neck pain. But the travel size starts out thinner & gets completely crushed under the weight of my head. Useless. I wish I could return it, but I think I missed the deadline. If you're a back sleeper, you'll probably be ok. But a side sleeper will wake up with a crook in your neck. Packingwise, it's still fairly bulky & with mediocre weight savings. You could do better with a blow-up from a camping store.
customer_reviews.author: Ildiko Gedeon

customer_reviews.title: MY PILLOW is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY PILLOW! We have switched our entire house to MY PILLOWS! I feel as thought I should be in their commercial. I doubted it I would love these pillows but once we tried them - everyone was sneaking that pillow into their room. So we finally just ordered some for everyone. Now we had to order the travel pillow as we can't sleep when traveling with out it. TRULY....THE BEST PILLOW - EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: VTJAX

customer_reviews.title: Mini travel MyPillow is good, but hold the phone
customer_reviews.text: So I got one of these pillows to travel to Europe this spring. I took it around to my hotels and and used it to augment my supplied pillow with the travel pillow. Clearly it's not a full sized pillow so you don't get the full MyPillow treatment. I will say I was glad I got it and felt it helped me get more comfort from a hotel pillow that may not have been as comfortable if used alone. One can roll this pillow up for easy packing. I wouldn't expect to use this alone and feel fully happy, but does help get a better night sleep while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: CyberBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Little but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: The small version of this fabulous pillow is excellent. Great to put onto a hotel pillow to convert it to a "my pillow" and still rolls up to fit into your suitcase. Also excellent behind your neck or in the small of your back on a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Green

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money - it’s a migraine maker!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - pillow rolls up well and fits carry on luggage. Cons - absolutely horrible to sleep on. This pillow goes very flat and offers no neck support while traveling. I purchased this to use on top of hotel pillows for extra support. Be prepared to wake up with a headache every morning. Bottom line - this thing is going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is the worst!
customer_reviews.text: When searching for a small pillow, I stated that I wanted a "FIRM" pillow. This is no where near a firm pillow what-so-ever!! Very lumpy. Great size and quilted cover are perfect, but, if I wanted cotton balls, I would have ordered them. So disappointed. Do you accept returns? Hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tiny but effective
customer_reviews.text: Liked the standard pillow's result on helping my neck so I bought the travel pillow. the travel pillow is almost as effective as the standard mypillow on relieving neck pain when traveling . it works great. Don't have to take a full size pillow with me. Lasts a full night without the need of fluffing. gave the queen pillows as gifts with credos from the new owners about relieving their neck pains also!
customer_reviews.author: BReview

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcase very scratchy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter. Had to return because pillowcase was so scratchy! My prior pillowcase was 100% cotton and very soft! It advertises 100% cotton on pillowcases. When you check the scratchy cases it is polyester/cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe21

customer_reviews.title: I am goldie locks the pillow snob!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this perfect sized pillow! I am a side sleeper and if the pillow is too wide or thick I get severe headaches that wake me up in the night. I have been using a small memory foam pillow but you kind of have to give them a break once in a while to re-fluff up. I have bought soooo many pillows in the last year or so looking for the perfect fit and even have cut open brand new pillows to make my own sized ones but they are never just right. I think I have found my perfect pillow now.
customer_reviews.author: Annette O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: This pillow makes me sleep longer better and more comfortably
customer_reviews.text: So have tried about every pillow ,,,bamboo memory foam the little beans Kind travel neck pillows cheap pillows expensive pillows Taking stuffing out etc etc but still neck and upper shoulder ache and restless sleep throughout the night and upon awakening in morning. Until finally trying this one. I love it!! And now feel confident enough to try the full size version despite the cost. I am a very small women so most adults might want to try the original size but this is a great pillow to try first because i will ALWAYS bring this one to hotels from now on!
customer_reviews.author: betsy johnson

customer_reviews.title: No support by itself
customer_reviews.text: No support what so ever! Bought it to replace older camping pillows, but those support better than this pillow. Definitely not a pillow to use by itself. Can’t judge as an add-on as that wasn’t the purpose for me. I needed a compact travel pillow with adequate support, and this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: To small for anything
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are to small for anything except getting in the way. They are smaller than the description by a good inch or 2. If it wasn't such a hassle to return things I'd definitely return them. I'm discovering it's best to buy things you know are going to be what you buy.
customer_reviews.author: rob D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in a small pillow....
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pillow! I brought it along on a trip to Disney World and used it on top of the hotel pillows for five days. I am so used to my regular My Pillow at home and this small pillow did the trick in comfort and support. It fits nicely in your suitcase, takes up no more room than a folded sweater. It does roll up to take up less space but that is not necessary as it fits perfectly in the suitcase. The pillowcase comes easily off for laundering. The material and print of the fabric of the pillowcase is also very nice and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: pjthekidsmommie

customer_reviews.title: No Neck Pain While Traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned at first when I saw the size but it ended up being the perfect travel pillow. It was small enough for my carry on. Easy to pull out and put away on the plane. I did what My Pillow suggested and used it on top of the hotel pillow. Whala!!! No Neck Pain. My only suggestion would be to make it available in a bit of a larger pillow as well. Thank you My Pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie White

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a full-size MyPillow and love it. I’ve traveled with it but thought WOW they make a travel size - how cool. Well ... the travel size pillow “does” have the texture BUT the size is ridiculously small and therefore making it uncomfortable and useless. I had to lay it on top of another pillow just to feel as if I’m actually using a pillow. I thought the travel size would at least be 1/2 the size of the normal pillow. I wouldn’t recommend buying the travel size unless you want it for your child to use. It’s too late for me to return so I’m out the $30.
customer_reviews.author: linda j popella

customer_reviews.title: Love my little MyPillow
customer_reviews.text: Cute Christmas tree design! I love that my head and neck fit perfectly. also Everyone in my house “borrows” these pillows from each other. I’ve bought each of my kids one and they love then. Anyways I was very skeptical for years but My 2 year old has been fascinated with the my pillow commercial for a while So I gave it a try and now he won’t sleep without his “my pillow” and neither will I!!! Thankyou Mike!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so well I bought the bed pillows!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this pillow on two trips going by airplane. I use it on the airplane and then for going out to eat when I arrive. I have even used it to supplement pillows on sofas of AirB&B's I've stayed at. I have since ordered two bed pillows from My Pillow and took one on my last trip as they take up hardly any room in a suitcase. I do find it's hard to keep in rolled up, but I don't mind as it's so convenient to use anyway.
customer_reviews.author: stlibraryreader

customer_reviews.title: Just NO!
customer_reviews.text: What in the world is so amazing and expensive about a bunch or pieces or foam cut up in a bag? lumpy little pillow. I will never by a mypillow again. Its a scam people!
customer_reviews.author: shawn kincaid

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I used this for camping on an eight day white water rafting/hiking trip in the Grand Canyon. I lead the tour. Usually I bring my group to Walmart on the way to the raft for last minute necessities. Walmart has a $2 travel pillow that works perfectly and can be discarded after the trip. Because I ABSOLUTELY LOVE MY "MY PILLOW" at home. I thought ordering this travel one would be equally great. It wasn't. I couldn't adjust how it conforms to my head/neck the way I can with my "My Pillow" at home. The Walmart option would have been better and cheaper. Sorry, but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tony adams

customer_reviews.title: really small
customer_reviews.text: No matter how generously I measure this pillow, it is only 16x10 not 18x12 as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: K. O. alden

customer_reviews.title: Moods more filling
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has so little stuffing in it that your head is almost flat on the mattress. I have several other travel pillows (which is what I always use for my head when sleeping) that are much more comfortable and were not as expensive. I’m sorry I wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Pillow
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pillows you can find out on the market I bought one for myself and love it so much my daughter wanted one I would definitely recommend this for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Miki hues

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype like commercial say
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because I thought that since the product has been advertised by the so called inventor of it himself, that it was different than other pillows. That is not the case, it’s a regular pillow you can buy in a store. It’s good for traveling only because I bought the travel size and my chiropractic pillow is too big to travel with on a plane, but I do take it everywhere when I drive out of town. But this MyPillow is not what the hype on commercials say it is. People really need to stop letting companies get away with false advertisement, ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I sleep with little pillows and this is the perfect size for my use. It also rolls up super compact so I can easily travel with it and always have a comfortable pillow. My old pillows would smash my ears at night and I'd wake up in pain. This one smooshes around all your parts and feels really great. I also sleep on my stomach and it's great for that.
customer_reviews.author: DPerez

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Nothing different about it.Gets flat n hot like regular pillow
customer_reviews.author: Shezoebadd

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fish house. It's simply just too small. I can't even take a nap with it and find a comfortable position or any real support. I think if it was used sitting up in the car, or on an airplane, it might serve some redeemable purpose. My expectation of it was maybe a little too high. It looks nice. The fabric feels good. The way it folds in on itself to pack or store works really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Greene

customer_reviews.title: Filled with chunky balls of cotton
customer_reviews.text: Nice color for the pillow case but the inside is filled with big chunky pieces of cotton. Who wants to sleep on chunks?? I think they picked up leftover, chunky pieces of cotton from the floor warehouse and decided to make a pillow out of it. What were you thinking people? I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Adelheid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for take along or home
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I purchased this pillow. I use it as a lumbar pillow and as a neck pillow. I take it with me in the car for my back when driving. I have been experiencing a lot of neck pain and it works great for neck support.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow?
customer_reviews.text: Was unlike any of the several pillows I've purchased from other retailers. This pillow had 10 to 15 % less stuffing inside. It was noticeably thinner. Don't know if it was a manufacture defect or some other reason.
customer_reviews.author: martin b.

customer_reviews.title: Mike Lindell 2024
customer_reviews.text: I saw the commercials and thought they were quite funny. NO ONE'S LAUGHING NOW. The pillow is uniquely supportive...fluffy yet firm. Mike Lindell tells no lies. You're going to love his pillas. For real though, this is an excellent small pillow. It met my expectations, which were elevated due to Mike's spicy mustache. I don't think the pillow is worth rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Jenkins Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, too small
customer_reviews.text: Good idea to make a travel size. Love the full size, but this one is smaller than most travel pillow, too expensive for what it is, and somewhat dissatisfying for those reasons. That said I do recommend full size, and you can pack the full size pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: N.J.

customer_reviews.title: Better than no pillow at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for a cross country plane trip and it's great because it rolls up into a small bundle and can fit in your backpack easily. It is much better than no pillow at all, but it lacks enough stuffing to be used comfortably. I found myself constantly having to readjust it. Great for fitting in backpack, not so great for comfort, better than no pillow at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cocobug

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't function well as a pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Not very supportive at all. I have to fold it in half to get any sort of support under my head. It's not like I've got some big old 20 lb melon on my shoulders. Aside from being very portable it's not very good. During my last campout I ditched it and ended up balling up a hoodie to use for a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE SMALL PILLOW
customer_reviews.text: THIS PILLOW PROVIDES EXCELLENT SUPPORT FOR THE SMALL OF MY BACK. i AM USING IT ON A SOFA THAT REQUIRES A LITTLE MORE SUPPORT FOR MY BACK TO BE TRULY COMFORTABLE. I CAN SHAKE IT OUT AND IT RETURNS TO ITS ORIGINAL SHAPE AFTER I HAVE SAT WITH IT FOR SOME TIME. THE PILLOW CASE IS ESPECIALLY SOFT AND NICE TO TOUCH. THE COLORS ARE VIBRANT AND ATTRACTIVE. I HAVE NOT YET TRAVELED WITH IT SINCE I JUST PURCHASED IT AND THERE IS NO TRAVEL DUE TO COVID-19 RESTRICTIONS. I IMAGINE IT WOULD BE FINE FOR TRAVEL IN THE FUTURE.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Tacky, embroidered logo is impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over the thermarest pillow because I thought that the pillow case was more attractive. I've worked in upholstery, so I figured I would just use a razorblade to remove the UGLY, tacky logo. The logo is embroidered on so intricately that I couldn't remove it and I ended up putting cuts in the pillowcase itself. Now I have to order a separate pillowcase. Whoever thought it was a good idea to force us to advertise their brand on something that is supposed to be a household good is a distasteful person indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: The problem with the pillow is it's small, I don't believe it makes the 12x18 status. However it is a very nice little pillow it seems to be made well it's comfortable it does roll up nice and can be tuck into the pillowcase for a lumbar support. I returned it for its size alone you be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Krautheim

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I already own 2 my pillow, which support me in bed in a semi sitting position for a medical problem. I was using another pillow at my neck, but when I switched to this product I got much better results for comfort surrounding my head and neck. I use another pillowcase on it so I can wash all the bedding together. I have anti allergy covers on the others, but left this one as is with the little rainbow pretty case.LOVE THE MY PILLOW PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Sommar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I love the My Pillow products. The biggest complaint was I can’t take them with me during vacations. Lugging a huge pillow in suitcase on airplane is soo not practical. Then I get laughed at for car rides with the biggie! Problem solved with this little guy! Perfect size for car trips, rolls up nice for suitcase! Great investment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAVEL PILLOW.
customer_reviews.text: Great travel pillow. Pillow provides adequate neck and head support. I have found a lot of uses of this pillow and it goes with me everywhere. Perfect for travel or at home. Highly recommend this pillow for travel/home use. Great quality and price. Pillow gets larger after washing and drying.
customer_reviews.author: Seyeret

customer_reviews.title: BEST Travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have used the "Memory foam" U-shaped pillows and they were not comfortable at all. I have "My Pillow" bed pillows and love them, so I thought I would hive this a try. I LOVE THIS! It is great for plane use, plus I love that it can be rolled down to a small size when I am not using it. IT IS WORTH every penny. If you have ever had neck and pillow issues, this is a God Send!
customer_reviews.author: Jtfleur

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small sized pillow that’s not too small and will crush down smaller if needed too. No funny smells but the pilllow case is a little stuff upon arrival which is easily fixed after being run through the wash, glad there were no issues with the raspberry color running either. Much better option than those microbead pillows.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Use for every night or travel.
customer_reviews.text: Have three of these. And a standard size. Use them on my bed for every day. There perfect for my side sleep.. one for my head and two to use to support my arm or leg.. The big one I use to prop up for reading in bed. When itravel one comes with me. The covers are nice to have to. Easy on and off. Wonderful pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Mt.Ruby Plum

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow Travel
customer_reviews.text: Both were given as gifts to people who recently had cervical spine surgery. They said that it helps the neck when sitting in a chair or the car. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Krysia

customer_reviews.title: Not for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst pillows for me. I am a back sleeper and could not compact the filling to a comfortable level. I was asked if I had followed the instructions (read them - put in dryer for a bit!) and yes, I had. While I know many people who absolutely love this pillow, it was one of the worst I tried in my quest to reduce neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: pk1

customer_reviews.title: Really is my favorite pillow
customer_reviews.text: Was given another pillow just like this at a home show, and I immediately loved it. As I’ve gotten older, I found I needed additional neck support when all other pillows I’ve tried weren’t enough. I use this on top of my standard pillow, and it works perfectly. Fits cozily under my neck and much easier to fall asleep. It’s also easy to fluff up into any other position I need whether on my side or laying flat.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great pillow and they last a really long time!
customer_reviews.text: I guess you take it for traveling but the cover is a bit bigger than the pillow and has a fold over flap with one Velcro in the middle and that is fine for me for home but traveling and carrying around it might fall out. Other than that it’s a great pillow as good as my other one I have had for about five years and I just wash and dry them. And they are as good as new but I need more for my new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, even for those the my pillow does not normally work for
customer_reviews.text: It works wonders and I am so glad to have preordered the water coloured one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for travel. Sometimes the pillows you get in hotels just aren't comfortable. I've never had a regular my pillow at home, my dad didn't loves it. So when I needed a new travel pillow and I saw that they had one I just had to buy it. Not only do I use it when I go away, I use it at home too. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Travel/Extra Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is good to take on the road as it is fairly small and good to use on top of another pillow if you need added height as a side-sleeper. Outside cover is washable and pillow can be "plumped up" by putting it in dryer with heat for 20 minutes. Could use a bit more fill as it tends to flatten after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support, decent travel alternative
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, maybe I too high of expectations after reading so many reviews. Love the concept, lightweight and travels well. However for me I found there to be a lack of support in the sturdiness of the pillow. You can fluff it a bit but does not last through the sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A Mother's Day Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my mom for mother's day (one of her presents anyway, but I digress). She said it's the greatest thing. She didn't want the full sized one, she gave me some big dissertation on how this is just right for her head while watching TV ... something, something ... anyway, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not fond of
customer_reviews.text: Could be wider filling wads up in the center rounding it rather than having a flatter surface and it fees hard on the head then. Always having to punch it out. But it hardened again soon after
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! A must-have for frequent travelers.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow! Best travel investment I’ve ever made- and I am a flight attendant so highest praise I can give it. It’s comfortable, cute, I like that it’s a real pillow and not a neck pillow, and it rolls up onto a small package so leaves plenty of room in a small carry-on bag for other essential items. If you’re a light packer it’s a must! When it unrolls it fluffs right back up. I honestly don’t know how I slept on planes before I had it. And it’s an awesome pattern just as the cherry on top :)
customer_reviews.author: JSTORE100

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pillow I love
customer_reviews.text: I have neck issues and have spent a fortune on pillows that I could not use. This is just the right thickness and softness that I need. I bought it for every night. I’m hoping they don’t discontinue this as I will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It does not roll back properly. Overpriced for what it’s really worth
customer_reviews.author: Darli

customer_reviews.title: Small, Supportive, and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Best camping pillow besides bringing my full size bed pillow. Is not slick on one side so it stays put. Gave great support despite me being used to sleeping on what amounts to 1 1/2 pillows at home. Rolls up quite small and uses its own case for storage so no small bag to lose in my tent or wherever else it could end up. I’ll be recommending to others in my Troop.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: A great travel pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I have been traveling with a full size pillow for years and this is a perfect replacement. It compacts down nicely yet feels just like full size My Pillow at home. Just like MyPillow it doesn’t get too hot ad supports my head with just the right amount of comfort. Easy to pop in he washer when home so it is always fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M DeGonge

customer_reviews.title: Good pillows! :)
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are a great size to put on top of your regular size pillow and for travel in the car! My pillows are very good! I wish the blue pillow case was of nicer, soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: I recant
customer_reviews.text: My initial response was unfair, I was in pain and a few days feels like months. It's great for the specific use I put it to. ThankYou
customer_reviews.author: swan

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one, I use them everywhere! They are just superb for necks! Wish they had more cases separately, but I’ve started making my own.
customer_reviews.author: EWC

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute pillow and cover, not for me, needed a bit more support. Would work to use rolled up for more support, but I needed a little different support. Try it if you aren’t sure.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schug

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This my second travel pillow and it is far below in quality from the first. It's flat and even after taking a large seam in it, it remains flat. I use my travel pillow as a cervical support pillow and this one supports nothing.
customer_reviews.author: maggiemo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. It's so flat that you have to fold it in half to get any sort of support. Very uncomfortable. The pillow case is nice, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: StruggleBugStee

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable At All
customer_reviews.text: This is not comfortable at all. Woke up with pain in the neck. Tried again for two more nights as well as while in a car traveling but it was never helpful. May as well wrap a jacket into a bundle and use it! Don't waste your money folks. Planning to return the two I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Hil's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Making car napping great again
customer_reviews.text: This has made car napping great again! Find some shade. Crack all 4-windows for a breeze. Lean the seat back to 45 degrees. Pillow under the neck nestled between the top of the seat and the headrest. Punch each side of the pillow in to prevent head roll. Napping nap time.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyLeeMiller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!  Will be buying an additional for husband!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo much better than a traditional horseshoe pillow and the fact that it fills up is perfect for plane or auto travel. Both the pillow and pillow case are machine washable. Absolutely love this and will be ordering on for my husband :)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay R.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of all the MyPillow products. This small version is great to travel with, take on trips, use in hotels, etc.! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Roll & Go Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I do massage therapy and use this pillow for my female clients. They have voiced positive comments regarding my use of this pillow. To me that's all that counts. If my clients are happy, I am happy. Great product and definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: stan simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, I am Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to beef up my going flat head pillow. The pillow is hot, so I put it underneath my pillow. Excellent, it is doing the job. I can prop myself up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutFL

customer_reviews.title: It has a lovely cover that I enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: It is great to use for your neck, but needs more support for your back. I think it could have a bit more filling.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this after all the hype I’ve seen on tv. I’ve got neck problems so need softness plus support. This pillow actually works pretty well. I’m hoping making I can break it in a bit by use, as I wish was a little softer. Pretty good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Palmer

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow should be your pillow
customer_reviews.text: Even when pillows are supposed to, they often fail to conform to your head and neck. This one does the job perfectly. It is very comfortable and the compact size is nice for travel but it's OK for regular usage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightly filled and flimsy, no different than using a couch accent pillow. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It's washable, supports my bad neck to reduce my pains. I use it also as a lumbar support for my back in my recliner during the day. Would never use any other pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this little pillow today. Lumpy to the touch but very comfortable under my head on the recliner and on the couch. Good for sitting and reclining. Ordered two more today.
customer_reviews.author: mfed

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is just the right sized pillow I needed. I used to use a regular pillow to snuggle up to. But, now I’m in the “menopause age range”, it doesn’t leave me waking up and sweating in the middle of the night, but gives me just enough “snuggle” to sleep comfortably. Also, it’s an AMAZING travel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: john hardee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the first My Pillow Product. Hopefully their other product are MUCH better. This pillow absolutely provided NO support to your head. I would of been better off rolling up a towel or using a sofa throw pillow. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: VEE

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow to travel to Israel. Very compact in my under seat carryon & was very comfortable, just like my large version at home!
customer_reviews.author: Hammerhead24

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect to travel with and more.  It's perfect for a  snooze on the couch.
customer_reviews.text: I have and had my Standard Size My Pillow for years, its, the best sleep ever. I travel with it everywhere, but I feared that I would leave it behind somewhere. So, I ordered the travel size and I received it in 2 days. It's just as comfortable as the the standard size. Love it!!!!!!!! I also love the traveling piilowcase that comes with the pillow.. Roll it up and go.....
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to travel
customer_reviews.text: I took the Travel n Go pillow with me on a recent trip. It fit just fine in a jammed packed suitcase. Not quite the support as my full-size "My Pillow", but still adequate. I also bought one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We love the “my pillow” but this travel pillow is a big no. It has no support at all. There is not enough filler or something. We thought maybe it just needed to be fluffed in the dryer. Nope. My husband travels for work and was excited to have this only to find that it was a let down. This Christmas gift will go back
customer_reviews.author: Angie Y

customer_reviews.title: Great elbow pad
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the car for my elbow. When taking a long trip my console makes my elbow ache. With this as a padded armrest, I'm comfortable. I can shift it from side to side too. I also use it in hotels when I can't bring my full size pillow. Love it, affordable comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Nice Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the size of a toddler pillow so, it’s great for kids but not for adults so much. Love the pillow case design and it comes off as well. Just thought it would be fuller or more supportive. It’s now a toddler pillow and on my child’s bed.
customer_reviews.author: LisAnn

customer_reviews.title: Love this little pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. I sleep with one under my arm and gave one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: So far this pillow is better than most. I only gave it 4 stars because it already seems to be losing some of its fluffiness. I don't know if I wash it if it will become worse or "fluff up" again. I didn't buy it for travel so I didn't rate it for that. I wanted a pillow that could tuck in my neck area and keep me from awakening with a stiff neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This little pillow works just like the big my pillow as it stays where you put it. I use it on the sofa for a quick nap.
customer_reviews.author: janet z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pillow! It folds up to a nice size and fluffs up quite a bit bigger. Great to put in a backpack for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Allmanjoy

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Because she really doesn’t like a lot of support. I though it felt like I didn’t have a -Illawarra under my head at all. Like all pillows, you just have to try it! I also found it lumpy... again, my mom loves, I don’t.
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: More than just a head travel pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I have many of the My Pillows. I sleep with the small one under my chin while sleeping or regular size My Pillow. I can now breathe thru the night and not wake up congested or coughing. I also drive with it under my leg when traveling long distances. I have them stashed everywhere I visit often.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, durable, and supportive travel sized pillow
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small pillow to take with me because I needed one to rest my head while I did yoga or when I just wanted to lay down and relax. This pillow is the perfect size for me (12 x 18inches), but not too small. It is easy to roll and comes with a pillowcase. The pillow is really soft, yet supportive, making it super comfortable for me. I suffer from some neck pain that comes and go and this pillow doesn't cause me any pain at all. It is so easy for me to fall asleep on this pillow too! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillows
customer_reviews.text: This is our fourth Go Anywhere pillow and they are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my full time pillow and it is great. Just the right amount of support. My order however was not flawless. One of my pillows had a taupe pillowcase and the other had none. Bummer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Neitzke

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow - soft , small & will be great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sing a joyful noise.

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfect little pillow
customer_reviews.text: Even tho this is a Travel size or kid size it is perfect for me!! Just the right comfort level. Not too soft or too fat. And I travel Internationally a lot so love the world map cover !!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cowart

customer_reviews.title: My pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use as a knee pillow. Not as thick or as firm as I’d like but that’s a chance you take. It’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas....He used it on the plane and at our destination...He loved it! :) I found it to be smaller than I thought it would be, however how easily it was to roll up and pack was great!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Short

product_meta.title: MyPillow Roll & GoAnywhere Pillow (Daybreak Blue)
feature_bullets: Made with our Patented Interlocking Fill -- Size 12'' x 18''
Use it on top of hotel pillows to get all the benefits of your MyPillow away from home
Use it for travel by plane, train or automobile -- Rolls Right into it's own travel case!
Provides lumbar support while working at your desk
MyPillow Promotions Not Valid Through Amazon.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,846 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
